content: Some weeks ago we discussed expectations for lang-team members. After that meeting I took a stab at writing up a hackmd which I never posted. I'm posting it now for feedback and thoughts. :)
heh yeah I think I had started adding that
maybe we can remove it but I think it may be a useful exercise for us to fill it in at some point
I'm wondering whether that is meant to be a summary of project-wide attitudes/values ...
along with perhaps trying to draft a charter
... or if there are values that are specific to the lang team that are worth spelling out there
it's kind of shared with project, I think, but I could imagine saying something about the role of a lang-team members in a discussion
I think one of the main things I take from this odcument is that we need to get better about the RFC feedback part of things
gotta balance the fun stuff with the not-as-fun stuff

Hey @T-lang, following up from the meeting today, I wanted to call attention to this document on expectations from lang team membership and get a sense whether this met with folks' expectations. I added some notes in the "Optional" section that I'd be curious about feedback on as well.
